app.cards.game

Class NOfAKind

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.cards.game.NOfAKind
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HandValue, java.lang.Comparable<NOfAKind>

     class NOfAKind
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<NOfAKind>, HandValue

    Represents an assortment of Cards with equal {link Rank}.

    An NOfAKind is the basis for poker hands like HandType.ONE_PAIR, HandType.TWO_PAIR, HandType.THREE_OF_A_KIND, HandType.FULL_HOUSE and HandType.FOUR_OF_A_KIND.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NOfAKind

        public NOfAKind(java.util.Set<Card> cards)
        Creates a new NOfAKind from the supplied Set of Cards
        Parameters:
        cards - the Cards to be used in the NOfAKind
        Throws:
        IllegalNOfAKindException - if not all of the supplied Cards are of the same Rank (and therefore don't make a valid NOfAKind)

      • getNBestCardsAsNewNOfAKind

        public NOfAKind getNBestCardsAsNewNOfAKind(int n)
        The n best Cards of this NOfAKind as a new NOfAKind
        Parameters:
        n - the number of Cards to pack into a new NOfAKind
        Returns:
        A newly created NOfAKind containing the n best Cards (as determined by the RankBeforeSuitComparator) from the original NOfAKind
        Throws:
        IllegalNOfAKindAccessException - if there are less than n Cards in the original NOfAKind
